data.meta_site_name: Daniel Mitchell Obituary | May 25, 2024 | Sheehan Funeral Home - Stoughton, MA
data.text:
Daniel Patrick Mitchell of Mansfield, passed away on May 25, 2024. He was 53 years old. He was the son of Kathleen (Leahy) Mitchell and the late Robert Mitchell and a brother to late Robert Mitchell. Other survivors include his wife Diane C. (Fraga) Mitchell of Stoughton, his mother-in-law Leotilde F. Avelar and her late husband Tobias G. Fraga also of Stoughton, his nephews, Bobby Mitchell, Corey Mitchell, Zach Mitchell, Shane Mitchell, his great nephew Robert Mitchell, his sister in laws, Sherry Mitchell, Julie Fraga, his brother in law, Armenio Fraga and his two children Thomas Fraga and Sarah Fraga and his god daughter Ivy DesRosiers.

Daniel was born in Brockton, Massachusetts on July 30, 1970. He was employed as a Freon Technician with Interstate Refridgerant Recovery for several years. Danny loved to golf, fish, ride his motorcycles and he also loved animals. He will be truly missed.

A funeral mass in Danielâ€™s memory will take place on Friday June 14, 2024 at 11:00 a.m. in the Immaculate Conception Church, 122 Canton Street, (Rt. 27) Stoughton. ALL ARE WELCOME TO ATTEND.
